list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a long, thin, flat piece of timber, used especially in building and flooring.
a fundamental point of a political or other program.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the central plank of the bill is the curb on industrial polluters
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ván trung tâm của hóa đơn là lề đường đối với những người gây ô nhiễm công nghiệp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a physical exercise designed to strengthen the abdominal muscles, in which one performs a press-up and holds the raised position for a set period of time.
make, provide, or cover with planks.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the ship was planked with teak
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Con tàu được plank với gỗ tếch

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: another term for plunk (sense 3 of the verb).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Ned planked the glasses in front of him
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ned vẽ kính trước mặt anh ta
